attributes.action: Knighthood for Chris Coleman and the freedom of Wales for the whole Wales team
attributes.background: Wales are flying the flag for the UK in Euro2016 against all odds, and deserve recognition for their efforts. A Knighthood for the manager, a posthumous Knighthood for Gary Speed and the freedom of the Country of Wales for the whole squad is well deserved. #TogetherStronger

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
